"Get ready to face the challenge considering you have the best mind in civil engineering, We are geared up with the combo of questions varying from civil engineering, reasoning, logical quizzes and much more.
Lets make the quiz a happening event with the help of rapid fire rounds and the buzzer round.

The event will be conducted in two rounds;
Prelims: A written test to test your knowledge based on basics of civil engineering, and logical puzzles.

Grand finale: the most awaiting event of civil engineering, getting to the most exciting rounds and a final one on one interview quiz.

Net Worth prizes: Rs. 4000"
